bibl.title: The Archaeological Setting of the Great Basilica Church at el-Ashmunein.
Archaeological Research in Roman Egypt. The Proceedings of The Seventeenth Classical Colloquium of The Department of Greek and Roman Antiquities, British Museum, held on 1-4 December, 1993
bibl.author: BARANSKI, Marek

bibl.note: Earlier remains. - Recent work on the basilica proper. - Remains of earlier buildings.
BARANSKI Marek, The Archaeological Setting of the Great Basilica Church at el-Ashmunein.

Archaeological Research in Roman Egypt. The Proceedings of The Seventeenth Classical Colloquium of The Department of Greek and Roman Antiquities, British Museum, held on 1-4 December, 1993 = JRA. Supplementary Series. 19 (Ann Arbor, Michigan, 1996) pp. 98-106, 8 figg.
